lyrics.text: is as wrong as can be, I'm sure of it
My mind is asking my heart
You are the one that I can't
live without if I'm not by his side
Although I know you are a path
with an illusion at its end
I can't be cured from your love
nor can I bear the withdrawal symptoms
Although I know you are a path
with an illusion at its end
I can't be cured from your love
nor can I bear the withdrawal symptoms
I can't be cured from your love
nor can I bear the withdrawal symptoms
لا انا قادرة من حبك اخف
لا أَنا قادِرَة مَن حَبّكِ أَخْفَ
لا أَنا قادِرَة مَن حَبّكِ أَخْفَ
You don't have to protect me, I'm not afraid
Please, don't put me aside again
Don't shut the door, don't leave me alone from now onwards
For for the first day of my life
I comprehend what's behind the door
For for the first day of my life
We can get closer, we can go back together
So that you forgo the sadness
For for the first day of my life
My heart belongs to you now
Go back home, amongst your beloved
Enjoy sun's light, and open the doors
I know. Don't worry, I won't be back
Run away and you'll be safe from my harm
Arendelle is weighed down under ... the... snow
You've created a never-ending winter everywhere
No problem, put a stop to what's happened
I can't, I... don't know how!!
Of course you know, you can do it
For for the first day of my life...
Oh, how stupid am I! There's no refuge for me!
No refuge from the snow of my heart
We'll put an end to the frost
Aah... You'll intensify the ice for sure!

englishTranslations.title: For for the first day of my life (Reprise)

lyrics.text: Wa lâ tughliqi-l bâb, wa lâ tatrukîni waḥdi ba'da-l ân
'a'rif, lâ taqlaqi falan 'a'ûd... Ana waḥîda, lakin bilâ quyûd
Lâ aqdiru, ana... lâ a'rifu kayf!!
Yâ lî min ḥamqâ'! Lâ mahraba lî!
ليس عليكِ حمايتي، انا لست خائفة
ولا تغلقي الباب، ولا تتركيني وحدي بعد الآن
لقد صنعت شتاءً أبدياً بكل مكان
!! لا أقدر، انا.. لا أعرف كيف
! يا لي من حمقاء ! لا مهرب لي

songs.title: (لأول يوم بعمري (إعادة [For the First Time in Forever (Reprise)]

lyrics.text: The snow tonight is like a desert that's never been trodden upon
A kingdom for the confused that I rule in peace
The wind is howling like a storm inside of me
How to make it vanish? I tried hard
Don't reveal the secret of the frost
Be the one your people wants you to be
Conceal your feelings so that they do not know
I will not bear the pain any longer
I do not fear anything that will be said
The snow does not disturb me anyway
The problem will get smaller if it is seen from far away
And the fear that overwhelmed me is no longer there
The time has come for victories to test all my powers
I will not cry from now onwards
Here is my land and I will stay on it
My power emanates from the air into the stones
And my soul is a spiral of snow shining like the light
And it crystallises so that it becomes a shell of frost
I will absolutely not go back
It will not be back, will not be back
And I will shine like the light
It will not be back, will not be back
Here I am now ; standing in front of people
In the middle of the winds
The snow does not disturb me anyway
Snow tonight is like the desert's sand, not touched by any foot
A kingdom for the confused, I rule it in peace
Wind is howling inside of me like a storm
How can it disappear? I tried hard
Don't uncover the secret of the ice
Be as your people want you to be
You (try) to hide your feeling so they don't sense it
I won't handle the suffering any more
I am not afraid about whatever is going to be said
Snow doesn't make me feel depressed
The problem shrinks if we look at it from a distance
And the fear that took control of me is no more
Time has come for victories, for testing all my abilities
With no boundaries to limit me
My land is here and on it I'll stay
My strength flows from air into rocks
My spirit is as an icy spiral that glitters like light
And it spirals to become an ice projectile
I certainly will not go back
The past has become so far away
And I will shine like light
Here I am now standing before the people
In the midst of the winds
Ath-thalju lleylata kaṣ-ṣaḥra' lam talmas hu aqdam
Al-mushkilatu sataṣghur law narâhâ min  ba'îd
Wa-l khawfu-l ladhi tamallakani lam ya'ud minhu mazîd
Qad ḥâna-l waqtu lintiṣârât kay akhtabira kulla-l qudrât
Wa rûḥi kalawlabin thaljiyyin yalma'u mithla-n nûr
Wa tatabalwaru fatakûnu qadhîfatan min jalîd
الثلج الليلة كالصحراء لم تلمسه اقدام
المشكلة ستصغر لو نراها من بعيد
والخوف الذي تملكني لم يعد منه مزيد
قد حان الوقت لإنتصارات لأختبر كل القدرات
فَـقوتيّ تسري من الهواء إلى الصخور
وروحي كلولبٍ ثلجي يلمع مثل النور
ها أنا الآن أقف امام الناس
Elsa: I'm trembling even tought I'm not cold and that's not understandable
And I sense a familiarity I see a dream so close but I hope it lasts
I sense you there like an old friend
I'm coming and it's as if I'm returning to my homeland
I was a locked up well with secrets of ice
And you have secrets don't hide them far away
Show yourself, let me meet you even for a day
You're the one I've been looking for for a long time?
I've never had any rest I've lived my life full of doubts
And what led me here perhaps holds the secret of my existence?
I was always strange and I do not submit to what's normal
The time has come (For) my path appear and for me to be to myself freely
Show yourself, there's no more trembling
I have come, I've crossed oceans
You are an answer to a question
Show yourself, reveal to me the secrets
Come close to me, open the door
I cannot bear a moment of torture
Oh, Come close to me, open the door
I cannot bear a moment of torture
Choir:The seas touch the north wind
And (there) it meets the river of memories
Iduna: Return home to me through the door
Elsa & Iduna: Show yourself, take the step with power
And be born into something new
Iduna:You were what you were looking for
Elsa: All of my life (Iduna: All of my life)
Elsa: Batra'esh wmish bardana wda mish mafhoum
Wehassa bil-olfa shayfa helm arib bas nefsi ydoum
Hassa beeki hnak, zayy sahba min zaman
Ana kont bir ma'foul fih asrar min galid
Inti elli kont badawwar 'aleha min zaman?
Ana 'omri ma do't erraha 'esht hayati fi znoum
Willi wassalni lhina gayez serr wgoudi bih marhoun?
Ana dayman konte ghariba wmish bakhda' lilma'louf
An el-awan tari'i yban winil'ab 'al mokshouf
Elsa & Iduna: Izhary, khodi lkhatwa b'owwa
Iduna: Inti elli kont ana bastannah
إلسا: بترعش ومش بردانة و ده مش مفهوم
و حاسه بالآلفة شايفة حلم قريب بس نفسي يدوم
حاسة بيكي هناك زي صاحبة من زمان
انا جايه و كأني لوطني بروح
انا كنت بير مقفول فيه اسرار من جليد
و انتي عندك اسرار ماتخبيهاش بعيد
انتي اللي كنت بدور عليها من زمان؟
انا عمري ما دقت الراحة عشت حياتي في ظنون
و اللي وصلني لهنا جايز سر وجودي ليه مرهون؟
انا دايمٱ كنت غريبة و مش بخضع للمآلوف
آن الأوان طريقي يبان و نلعب علي المكشوف
انتي إجابة علي سؤال عايش جوايا
إلسا ذ إدونا: اظهري خدي الخطوة بقوة
إدونا: انتي اللي كنت أنا باستناه
Anna: Yeah, the wind has become colder
And the clouds are moving along with the autumn breeze
Olaf: The scarecrow has fallen and is a mess
And my sad leaf became wiser
Anna: There are things that will certainly never be lost
Yes, things that don't get lost
Like feeling the touch of your hand
Anna & Olaf: You care for me and I care for you
Anna: Strongest wall it never falls like the things that certainly last
As long as we'll always stay together
Kristoff: The leaves have normally fallen
It's as if my future is calling
Sven: Are you telling me you'll ask for her hand tonight in a sweet way?
Kristoff: But when it comes to these things I get very scared
Sven: It's better that you leave these things to me because I'm an expert
Kristoff: Yes, things that don't get lost
Like my love for her for always
Like how reindeers are better than humans
If I get courageous, and gain time I'll know what to do and I'll say (it) Right?
Sven: Things that don't get lost
Kristoff: Sven, you're the one with good manners
Maybe it's because I heard the voice something is coming
I'm afraid that if something changes it will stay that way
Our days are sweet, I don't want to lose them
It's hard to stop time but we can enjoy a lovely day
Everyone: The wind has become colder
Anna & Kristoff: We'll all count the blessings (God has) brought us from heaven
Everyone: We'll live welfaring here all of our lives
Elsa: I give you my word that our flag will keep waving in the air
In a blink of an eye the years will go by
(and) Will stay stronger than the unknown
Why wouldn't good luck last,and what's past be brought back? Time passes on and goes by
Anna: And we'll always stay together
Anna: And we'll always stay together
Anna: Aywa, el reeh ba'et abrad aktar
wel sahab byet-harak maa nesmet el khareef
Khayal el ma'ata we'a w etbahdel
Olaf: W wara'ti el hazeena ba'et aa'al
Anna: Fih hagat akid omraha ma tedeea
Anna & Olaf: Albak alaya w alby aleik
Anna: Zai a'wa gedar omro ma yenhar hagat akeed betdoom
toul mahna sawa nefdal ala tool
Kristoff: Wara' el shagar we'ea ady
Sven: Ayez te'oli hatetlob eidha el leila di b shakl lateef?
Kristoff: Bas ana fel hagat di awi bakhaf
Zai el shamae w khawatem el zefaf
Sven: El ahsan tesebli el hagat di asl ana hareef
Zai en el rann ahsan mel bashar
Law etgara't, w kesebt el wa' haaraf amel eh w a'oul, Sah?
Kristoff: Sven, enta eli aref el osoul
Yemken ashan ana semeat el fih haga gaya
Ana khayfa law shei' etghayar yedoom
saab eni awa'af zaman laken momken netmataa b youm badeea
Alkulu: El reeh ba'et abrad aktar
Olaf: W ento shakloko ba'a akbar
Anna & Kristoff: Hanaed kolena ma gablena mel sama
Alkulu: Haneaish f kheir hena kol hayatna
Elsa: Waad meny tefdal rayetna terafraf fel hawa
Leih el haz maydomsh, w ely fat mayergaash? Yemdy el wa't w yefout
Anna: Wehna sawa nefdal ala tool
Anna: Wehna sawa nefdal ala tool
آنا: ايوة، الريح بقت ابرد اكتر
و السحاب بيتحرك مع نسمة الخريف
أولاف: و ورقتي الحزينة بقت اعقل
آنا: في حاجات اكيد عمرها ما تضيع
آنا ذ أولاف: قلبك علي و قلبي عليك
آنا: زي اقوي جدار عمره ما ينهار حاجات اكيد بتدوم
طول ما احنا سوا نفضل علي طول
سڤين: عايز تقوللي هتطلب ايديها الليلة دي بشكل لطيف؟
كريستوف: بس انا في الحاجات دي اوي بخاف
سڤين: الاحسن تسيبلي الحاجات دي اصل انا حريف
زي ان الرن احسن من البشر
لو اتجرات، و كسبت الوقت هعرف اعمل ايه و اقول، صح؟
كريستوف: سڤين، انت اللي عارف الأصول
في حاجة جاية انا خايفة لو شيئ اتغير يدوم
ايامنا حلوة ، مش عايزة اسيبها تضيع
صعب اني اوقف زمن لكن ممكن نتمتع بيوم بديع
أولاف: و انتوا شك لكوا بقي اكبر
كريستوف ز آنا: هنعد كلنا ما جابلنا من السماء
الكل: هنعيش في خير هنا كل حياتنا
إلسا:وعد مني تفضل رايتنا ترفرف في الهواه
ليه الحظ مايدومش، و اللي فات مايرجعش؟ يمضي الوقت و يفوت
آنا: واحنا سوا نفضل علي طول
آنا: واحنا سوا نفضل علي طول

songs.title: حاجات مش بتضيع [Some Things Never Change]

lyrics.text: I hear your voice, but no
Some people seek danger, which I avoid
I have many reasons that prevent me from responding
And to ignore your whispers and wish for their disappearance
You're a ringing in my ear
And if I heard you, you're an illusion!
I would be like those in fear
Those that I love are here in every corner
I'm sorry, mysterious voice - I have no place for you
What I've lived from promises in the past is enough
I'm afraid if I follow you I'll be lost
On an unknown path! On an unknown path!
What do you want from me? You've caused sleep to fly away from me
[Do] you want to confuse me, to make my mistakes huge?
Or are you in a different world? In which something's touching me
And you know for sure, the estrangement here in my place
Every day's burden is even greater when my powers increase
I don't know that a piece of me yearns to go
On an unknown path! On an unknown path!
Do you hear my voice? Do you know me?
Do you feel me? Show yourself to me
Leaving me alone and moving on right away - When do I reach you?
Where and how... On an unknown path?
Nas tes'a lel khatar, wana batfadah
Watgahal hamsek, watmana innu yghib. Oh...
Elli ana bahebohom hena fkolli l'arkan,
Ana asfa aa sot ya ghamed - Inta malakshi 'andi makan
Kifaya elli 'eshtu fi lmadi men wo'ood
Ana khayfa law meshit warak ella atouh
Fi tari' maghoul, fi tari' maghoul
Ayza menni eeh? Khaleeti ennoum menni ytir'
Walla-anti f'alam tani? Fi haga lamsani
We 'arfa akid ghorbiti hena fi makani
Kolli yom hemlo akbar lamma l'owa 'andi tzid
Mesh 'arfa inni goz'e menni nefsou yrouh
Fi tari' maghoul, fi tari' maghoul
Saybani lwahdi we btemshi 'ala tool, imta awsallek?
Fin we ezzai fi tari' maghoul?
في أسباب عندي كتيرة تمنعني أستجيب
و أتجاهل همسك و أتمنى انو يغيب أوه
إلي أنا بحبهم هنا في كل الأركان
أنا اسفة يا صوت يا غامض إنت مالكش عندي مكان
كفاية إلي عشتو في الماضي من وعود
أنا خايفة لو مشيت وراك إلا أتوه
في طريق مجهول في طريق مجهول
عايزة مني إيه ؟ خليتي النوم مني يطير
إنتي عايزة تلخبطيني عشان غلطي يبقى كبير ؟
ولا إنتي في عالم تاني ؟ في حاجة لمساني
و عارفة أكيد غربتي هنا في مكاني
كل يوم حملو أكبر لما القوة عندي تزيد
مش عارفة إن جزء مني نفسو يروح
في طريق مجهول في طريق مجهول
سايباني لوحدي و بتمشي على طول إمتى أوصلك ؟
فين و إزاي في طريق مجهول ؟
Anna: It is the coronation day
Open the doors and the windows, I haven't seen anything like this before
I have always wandered the empty dancing halls and finally they are opening their doors
We will see guests which is something strange (we're not used to)
No doubt i will need training (need to be prepared)
For it is the first time for us to enjoy the music and the lights
and i will finally dance in tonight's celebration
Is it fear or joy that I am feeling now? or something in between
For the first time I am surviving my loneliness
what if I met the one
Tonight I wear a dress, like flowers in the garden
a masterpiece of magnificence and sensation
I see him sitting like a prince, a stranger with a handsome face
I pretend to be busy eating desserts
After that, we spend the night laughing (having good time) which i am not used to
He came into my life unannounced (suddenly)
And for the first time in my life i forget the sadness
for the first time in my life someone is having a crush on me
It is indeed a crazy wish..to dream about my beloved one
as, it is for the first time in my life, that i actually feel that i may have a chance
Elsa, don't expose the secret of the ice,,be like your people want you to be
Hide your feeling,,put on a mask
As all it takes is just one mistake and the secret will be totally exposed.
ELSA: Today is not the day
Anna: Today is not the day
ELSA: Tell the guards to open the doors
Anna: For the first time in my whole life
ELSA: Don't expose the secret of the snow/ ice
Anna: I am finally getting what i want
ELSA: be as your people wish you to be ( don't let them down)
Anna: it is finally the chance at conquering our sadness
Anna: it is my chance at living my life
ELSA: Hide your feeling..don't expose it
Anna: Today is my day, my chance..before the doors get closed again
as it is for the first time that the doors are opened in front of me(for me)

englishTranslations.title: For the first time in my life

lyrics.text: Fattiho L nawafitha wal abwaab.. Lam ara qablan hatha minhom
Wa arafto anna sohoonana fel alaaf!
La talama jobto L qa'at.. Al khalyaati min al hafalat!
Wa lasawfa nara doyoofan.. wa howa amron ghareeb!
La shak sawfa ahtaajo li tadreeb!
Fa le awwali marratin sanafrah.. bel mousiqa wal adwa'a
Wa sa arqoso akhiran.. fi ehtifal L masaa'
Hal howa khawfon am sa'ada? Am fima bainahom akoon?
Fa le awwli marratin sa anjo min wahdati!
Atashawwaqo li moqabalty ba'adi L naas!
Matha lao qabalto maan ahlomo bih?
Al laylata artadi fostaan.. Mithl al zahr fil bostaan
Araho yajliso kal amir..gharibon laho wajhon moneer
Atashagalo anho bel halwa ya nas!
Wa li awwali yaomin b omri..
Wa li awwali yaomin bi omri
Omnyaton haqqan majnoon.. An ahlom bel mahboob!
Fa li awwali yaomin b omri
La takshifi sir al jaleed.. Kooni kama sha'boki yoreed!
Ekhfi L ihsas,, da'i L qinaa'!
Qol lel horrasi taftah.. al baab
Wa li awwali yaomin b omri
Al forsato li qahri L ahzaan
Al yaoma howa li L forsa.. Qabla ghalqi L abwaab
Fa li awwali yaomin b omri
Wa li awwali yaomin b omri
فَتَحَوا النَوَافِذَ والأَبْواب .. لَم أَرىَ قَبْلاً هَذا مِنّهُم
هل هو خوفٌ أم سعادة ؟ أم في ما بينهمَ أكون؟
ماذا لو قابلت من أحلم به؟
الليلة أرتدى فستان .. مثل الزهر فى البستان
أراه يجلس كالأمير .. غريبٌ لهُ وجهٍ منير
إلسا: لا تكشفى سر الجليد .. كونى كما شعبكِ يريد
آنا: اليوم هو لي الفرصة .. قبل غلق الأبواب

songs.title: لأول يوم بعمري [For the First Time in Forever]

lyrics.text: The seas touch the north wind
And (there) it meets the river of memories
The river will tell us what once was.
In it you'll find all the answers
Enter steadily into the heart of the voice
But don't you go to far distances
Its singing will reach the one who wants it
And her voice calls with miracles
How will you face the fear
And the one who holds the memories?
The seas touch the north wind
It will meet them carrying memories
Return home to me through the door
Our loss will gather (and) reunite the loved ones
Telmes el bahr reeh el shamal
Fi alb el sot edkholy b thabat
Ezay hatbosi f wesh el khouf
Telmes el bahr reeh el shamal
